titles.title: Horse Transportation Safety Act of 2011
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to prohibit the transportation of horses in interstate transportation in a motor vehicle containing two or more levels stacked on top of one another.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 6/27/2011--Introduced. Horse Transportation Safety Act of 2011 - Prohibits a person from transporting a horse in interstate commerce in a motor vehicle (except a vehicle operated exclusively on rail or rails) containing two or more levels stacked on top of one another. Sets forth civil penalties for persons who knowingly violate such prohibition.
